<<<<<<< HEAD
The sure foundation: or certain principles of Christian religion by short examples applied to every rule of syntaxis to illustrate the same. By Paul Salomeau schoolmaster at East-Sheene in the county of Surrey. Salomeau, Paul.
[4], 73, [3], 16, [2] p.
Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Henry Seile at his shop over against St Dunstans Church., London, : 1653.
"Colloquia familiaria Latino carmine composita" has separate dated title page and separate pagination; register is continuous. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June. 9". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
